com.ibm.cloud.sdk.core.util

Class CredentialUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.cloud.sdk.core.util.CredentialUtils

  • public final class CredentialUtils
extends Object
    CredentialUtils retrieves service credentials from the environment.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String PLAN_STANDARD 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Map<String,String> getEnvCredentialsAsMap(String serviceName)
      Returns a Map containing properties found within the process' environment that are associated with the specified cloud service.
      static Map<String,String> getFileCredentialsAsMap(String serviceName)
      Returns a Map containing properties found within the credential file that are associated with the specified cloud service.
      static Map<String,String> getServiceProperties(String serviceName)
      This function forms a wrapper around the "getFileCredentialsAsMap", "getEnvCredentialsAsMap", and "getVcapCredentialsAsMap" methods and provides a convenient way to retrieve the configuration properties for the specified service from any of the three config sources.
      static Map<String,String> getVcapCredentialsAsMap(String serviceName)
      Returns a Map containing properties found within the VCAP_SERVICES environment variable that are associated with the specified cloud service.
      static String getVcapValue(String serviceName, String key)
      Returns the property named 'key' associated with the specified service.
      static String getVcapValue(String serviceName, String key, String plan)
      Returns the value associated with the provided key from the VCAP_SERVICES, or null if it doesn't exist.
      static boolean hasBadStartOrEndChar(String credentialValue)
      Returns true if the supplied value begins or ends with curly brackets or quotation marks.
      protected static Map<String,String> parseCredentials(String serviceName, List<String> contents)
      Parses each of the entries in "contents" that are related to the specified cloud service.

    • Method Detail

      • hasBadStartOrEndChar

        public static boolean hasBadStartOrEndChar(String credentialValue)
        Returns true if the supplied value begins or ends with curly brackets or quotation marks. Returns false for null inputs.
        Parameters:
        credentialValue - the credential value to check
        Returns:
        true if the value starts or ends with these characters and is therefore invalid

      • getVcapValue

        public static String getVcapValue(String serviceName,
                  String key)
        Returns the property named 'key' associated with the specified service.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service
        key - the name of the property to retrieve
        Returns:
        the value of the specified property

      • getVcapValue

        public static String getVcapValue(String serviceName,
                  String key,
                  String plan)
        Returns the value associated with the provided key from the VCAP_SERVICES, or null if it doesn't exist. In the case of the API URL, if VCAP_SERVICES aren't present, this method will also search in JNDI.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the service name
        key - the key whose value should be returned
        plan - the plan name
        Returns:
        the value of the provided key

      • getFileCredentialsAsMap

        public static Map<String,String> getFileCredentialsAsMap(String serviceName)
        Returns a Map containing properties found within the credential file that are associated with the specified cloud service.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the cloud service whose properties should be loaded
        Returns:
        a Map containing the properties

      • getEnvCredentialsAsMap

        public static Map<String,String> getEnvCredentialsAsMap(String serviceName)
        Returns a Map containing properties found within the process' environment that are associated with the specified cloud service.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the cloud service whose properties should be retrieved
        Returns:
        a Map containing the properties

      • getVcapCredentialsAsMap

        public static Map<String,String> getVcapCredentialsAsMap(String serviceName)
        Returns a Map containing properties found within the VCAP_SERVICES environment variable that are associated with the specified cloud service.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the cloud service whose properties should be retrieved
        Returns:
        a Map containing the properties

      • getServiceProperties

        public static Map<String,String> getServiceProperties(String serviceName)
        This function forms a wrapper around the "getFileCredentialsAsMap", "getEnvCredentialsAsMap", and "getVcapCredentialsAsMap" methods and provides a convenient way to retrieve the configuration properties for the specified service from any of the three config sources. The properties are retrieved from one of the following sources (in precendence order): 1) Credential file 2) Environment variables 3) VCAP_SERVICES
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service
        Returns:
        a Map of properties associated with the service

      • parseCredentials

        protected static Map<String,String> parseCredentials(String serviceName,
                                  List<String> contents)
        Parses each of the entries in "contents" that are related to the specified cloud service.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service whose properties will be returned
        contents - a list of strings representing the contents of a credential file
        Returns:
        a Map containing the properties related to the specified cloud service
